--- Switchblade / Astroblast ---

Switchblade watches the ariel combat that is occuring above the Dark 
Avian. He refrains from firing on the enemy due to the fact that 
there were friendlies in the line of fire. His sensors pick up 
Astroblast entering the battle.

Astroblast swoops in from a high altitude, and checks out the battle. 
He doesn't fire immediately, but manoevers to approach from a better 
angle. He waits till the allies weren't going to be hit by his fire, 
and he unleashes four laser blast, two from each cannon.

ooc: Clearing a few things up, mostly for Yanshosh anyway. The ship 
is called the D-a-r-k A-v-i-a-n. (not the Dark Avion) Also, the ship 
isn't under the water, it is floating half in and half out of the 
water. =)


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Autofire::
> 
> Autofire lowers down deeper into the ocean as he speeds toward the 
> ship, finally pulling up and flying toward the surface at a 70 
degree 
> angle, erupting from the water around the ship in his jet mode. He 
> flies up toward Darkwing, on a collision course and firing twenty 
> shots from both his front cannons at the bot.
